text:
David Breen Seymour (born 24 June 1983) is a New Zealand politician. He is the Epsom electorate MP, and leader of ACT New Zealand. Seymour worked in public policy in Canada.
In November 2015, Seymour was named the Trans Tasman 2015 Politician Of The Year.
Seymour appeared on the seventh series of Dancing with the Stars.
